content: Hey DevDays, I'm looking to register for DevDays in November. Historically there was a reduced rate for HL7 members. Is this still available?

Hi Nick, In the June DevDays event there usually is a HL7 member reduced rate. For the DevDays in November we have the frequent visitor discount rate. If you send an email to devday@fire.ly and mention whicht DevDays you have attended a discount code will be sent to you.
